entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: Receipt Wrangler API v3.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • bugfix/fix-receipt-table-summary by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v3.13.0...v3.14.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: Receipt Wrangler API v4.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • enhancement/return-app-data-on-login by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/176
  • Tech/flutter by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/177
  • Update swagger by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/178
  • Tech/consolidate configs by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/180
  • fix ci by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/181

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v3.15.0...v4.0.0

Breaking Changes

  • API Configuration has been consolidated into one config file, config.prod.json. To migrate, check out: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/.github/blob/main/configuration/configuration.md for the new structure, and simply move the database env variables from the docker compose, and the feature config values to config.prod.json. Check out: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/.github/tree/main/examples for some examples specific to your database type.

  • openApiKey has been removed from the configuration. To migrate, use the aiSettings in the config file instead as shown here: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/.github/blob/main/configuration/configuration.md

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: Receipt Wrangler API v4.2.0
